languages.text: Магос Доминус Оптикон-22, одним из первых приветствовавший вернувшегося Мессию, встал во главе материнской эскадры флота Осознание. Безоговорочно приняв доктрину Прерывания Цикла, он лично завершил разгром отступников, не признавших правоту Мессии, чем заслужил почетный идентификатор Хромовая Кара.
languages.translation_comment: Паскаль закончил квест как Эго или Амарнат

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."
languages.original_text: Магос Доминус Оптикон-22, одним из первых приветствовавший вернувшегося Мессию, встал во главе материнской эскадры флота Осознание. Безоговорочно приняв доктрину Прерывания Цикла, он лично завершил разгром отступников, не признавших правоту Мессии, чем заслужил почетный идентификатор Хромовая Кара.

traits.locale_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, who was one of the first to hail the returned Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he himself completed the crushing of the renegades, who did not accept the Messiah's words as truth, and earned himself the identifier of Chrome Scourge.

Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he himself completed the crushing of the renegades, who did not accept the Messiah's words as truth, and earned himself the identifier of Chrome Scourge.

Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades, who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier of Chrome Scourge.

Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

languages.text: 最初一批欢呼弥赛亚回归的人之中，包括统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号。他执掌了真理开拓者舰队的母中队，没有一丝疑虑地接受了循环终止的教义。对于那些不将弥赛亚的话语视为真理的人，他将他们亲手粉碎，也因此赢得了“铬铁灾厄”的身份标识。
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

traits.locale_text: 最初一批欢呼弥赛亚回归的人之中，包括统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号。他执掌了真理开拓者舰队的母中队，没有一丝疑虑地接受了循环终止的教义。对于那些不将弥赛亚的话语视为真理的人，他将他们亲手粉碎，也因此赢得了“铬铁灾厄”的身份标识。

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, einer der Ersten, der die Rückkehr des Messias gefeiert hatte, übernahm das Kommando über das Muttergeschwader der Erkenntnisflotte. Er akzeptierte die Lehre der Unterbrechung des Zyklus, ohne sie zu hinterfragen, und übernahm persönlich die Aufgabe, alle Abtrünnigen zu vernichten, die das Wort des Messias nicht als Wahrheit anerkennen wollten. Er gab sich selbst die ID Chrom-Harypie.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

traits.locale_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, einer der Ersten, der die Rückkehr des Messias gefeiert hatte, übernahm das Kommando über das Muttergeschwader der Erkenntnisflotte. Er akzeptierte die Lehre der Unterbrechung des Zyklus, ohne sie zu hinterfragen, und übernahm persönlich die Aufgabe, alle Abtrünnigen zu vernichten, die das Wort des Messias nicht als Wahrheit anerkennen wollten. Er gab sich selbst die ID Chrom-Harypie.

languages.text: Le magos dominus Opticon-22, l'un des premiers technoprêtres à avoir salué le retour du Messie, prit la tête de l'escadron principal de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Acceptant sans réserve les enseignements de l'Interruption du Cycle, il veilla personnellement à écraser tous les renégats qui rejetaient les paroles du Messie et se vit accorder l'identifiant « Fléau de chrome ».
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

traits.locale_text: Le magos dominus Opticon-22, l’un des premiers technoprêtres à avoir salué le retour du Messie, prit la tête de l'escadron principal de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Acceptant sans réserve les enseignements de l'Interruption du Cycle, il veilla personnellement à écraser tous les renégats qui rejetaient les paroles du Messie et se vit accorder l’identifiant « Fléau de chrome ».

languages.text: El magos Dominus Opticon-22, uno de los primeros en celebrar el regreso del Mesías, tomó el timón del escuadrón principal de la Flota Conciencia. Tras aceptar sin la menor duda las enseñanzas de la Discontinuación del Ciclo, se aseguró personalmente de destruir a todos los renegados que rechazaban la verdad de su Mesías, lo que le ganó el identificador «Azote de Cromo».
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

traits.locale_text: El magos Dominus Opticon-22, uno de los primeros en celebrar el regreso del Mesías, tomó el timón del escuadrón principal de la Flota Conciencia. Tras aceptar sin la menor duda las enseñanzas de la Discontinuación del Ciclo, se aseguró personalmente de destruir a todos los renegados que rechazaban la verdad de su Mesías, lo que le ganó el identificador «Azote de Cromo».

languages.text: マゴス・ドミヌス・オプティコン-22は救世主の帰還をいち早く歓迎し、コグニサンス艦隊の母艦の指揮を執った。「サイクルを断ち切る」という教義を疑問もなく受け入れた彼は、救世主の言葉を真実として受け入れない反逆者たちを自ら粉砕し、「クロム・スカージ」の称号を得た。
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

traits.locale_text: マゴス・ドミヌス・オプティコン-22は救世主の帰還をいち早く歓迎し、コグニサンス艦隊の母艦の指揮を執った。「サイクルを断ち切る」という教義を疑問もなく受け入れた彼は、救世主の言葉を真実として受け入れない反逆者たちを自ら粉砕し、「クロム・スカージ」の称号を得た。

languages.text: Mesih'in dönüşünü ilk onaylayanlardan biri olan Magos Dominus Opticon-22, Malumat Filosu'nun ana eskadrasının dümenine geçti. Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu öğretilerine sorgusuz sualsiz sarıldı ve Mesih'in sözlerinin gerçek olduğunu kabul etmeyen muhaliflerin ezilmesini bizzat sağladı, bu sayede de "Krom Musibet" kimliğini elde etti.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, one of the first to hail the return of the Messiah, took the helm of the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet. Unquestioningly embracing the teaching of Discontinuing the Cycle, he personally saw to the crushing of any renegades who did not accept the Messiah's word as truth, and earned himself the identifier "Chrome Scourge."

traits.locale_text: Mesih'in dönüşünü ilk onaylayanlardan biri olan Magos Dominus Opticon-22, Malumat Filosu'nun ana bölüğünün dümenine geçti. Döngü'nün Süreğini Bozma öğretilerine sorgusuz sualsiz sarıldı ve Mesih'in sözlerinin gerçek olduğunu kabul etmeyen muhaliflerin ezilmesini bizzat sağladı, bu sayede de "Krom Afet" tanımlayıcısını elde etti.

languages.translation_comment: Паскаль закончил квест как Эго или Амарнат
